sentences.english: What are dental calculus and odontolith?
There are a variety of ingredients used in toothpaste to help prevent the accumulation of tartar on the teeth.
sentences.chinese: 牙膏配方中加入了很多成分来防止牙垢的累积。

sentences.english: When it hardens, the tartar will need to be removed by your dental professional.
sentences.chinese: 当硬化的牙垢将需要您的牙科专业删除。

sentences.english: Tartar can cause tooth decay if not removed by polishing teeth.
sentences.chinese: 牙垢可引起蛀牙，如果不通过抛光去除牙齿。

sentences.english: With HCS white formula will help clean teeth, eliminate the tartar.
sentences.chinese: 含HCS亮白配方，有助洁白牙齿，祛除牙垢。

sentences.english: If it is found that the small teeth have tartar, then use gauze to gently wipe.
sentences.chinese: 如果发现小牙上已经有牙垢，则要用纱布给轻轻擦去。

sentences.english: Mouthwash ingredients, can penetrate between the teeth, rapid removal of tartar, teeth stains.
sentences.chinese: 漱口水成份，能深入牙缝，快速地去除牙垢，牙渍。

sentences.english: Can we prevent dental calculus and odontolith?
sentences.chinese: 牙垢和牙石可以预防吗？

sentences.english: How to remove the dental calculus and odontolith?
sentences.chinese: 怎样除去牙垢和牙石呢？

sentences.english: Both the design and the formulation of the treat contribute to plaque and tartar reduction.
sentences.chinese: 双方的设计和制订治疗有助于菌斑和牙垢减少。

definition: caries/rotten tooth (colloquial)/see also 齲齒|龋齿[qu3 chi3]
tea stain (on the inside of a tea pot, tea cup etc)
